description: This table contains information about changes to this variant record done as a result of Happy Together variant auto-reconciliation.

columns.name: VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the variant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record. Each line corresponds to a happy together action taken on this variant record.

columns.name: RESULT_KEY
columns.description: The Reference ID of the result data to which this variant is linked.  This can be used to link to result information for the result to which this variant is linked, for example, by linking to DOCS_RCVD_RSLTS and DOCS_RCVD_RSLT_VAR_INFO.

columns.name: VAR_INFO_DOCUMENT_CSN_ID
columns.description: The CSN of the source DXR from which this variant was reconciled

columns.name: HT_VAR_AUDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The action that was performed during variant auto-reconciliation


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Created


Automatically Retracted


Invalidated

columns.name: HT_VAR_AUDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The time instant in UTC when the action was performed

columns.name: HT_VAR_AUDIT_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The time instant in local time when the action was performed
